fields.label: Folder Prefix
fields.description: Prefix to add before opportunity name. Folders are created in: /ALKHORA/استيرادية {YEAR}/{prefix}{opportunity_name}

fields.label: Use SSH + OCC (Fastest Method)
fields.description: Enable to use SSH to execute OCC commands directly on Nextcloud server. Requires SSH access.

fields.label: SSH Host
fields.description: SSH hostname or IP (e.g., cloud.alkhora.com or via Cloudflare tunnel)

fields.label: SSH Username
fields.description: SSH username (e.g., root, www-data, or your user)

fields.label: SSH Key Path (Optional)
fields.description: Path to SSH private key file on ERPNext server. Leave empty to use default SSH key.

fields.label: OCC User
fields.description: User to run OCC command as (usually www-data or apache). The SSH user must have sudo permissions to run commands as this user.

fields.label: Cloudflare Access Service Token (Optional - Alternative to IP Bypass)
Use Cloudflare Service Token
fields.description: Enable to use Cloudflare Access Service Token instead of IP-based bypass. Requires cloudflared to be installed on ERPNext server.

fields.label: Cloudflare Client ID
fields.description: Service Token Client ID from Cloudflare Zero Trust > Access > Service Tokens

fields.label: Cloudflare Client Secret
fields.description: Service Token Client Secret from Cloudflare Zero Trust > Access > Service Tokens
